nodes.text: Laminasteel, also spelled as Lamina Steel, or was a greenish-colored alloy that could be used in lightsaber construction. In 14 BBY the fugitive Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis acquired enough lamina steel to fashion a lightsaber hilt.
Laminasteel was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace. Laminasteel originally appeared in Star Wars Legends.[source?]
